alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 2:36AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Garfield and southern Wheeler Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 236 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Ericson, or 10 miles northeast of Ord, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Ericson and Pibel Lake State Recreation Area. This includes Highway 281 between mile markers 132 and 145. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in North Platte.
